name: Delirious Desolation of the Sacred Lord
description: Weapon Ascension Material.  During the war with the dragons, that mastermind of all the tribes — the sameone who had hidden his face behind a mask — deciphered the golden patterns onthe non-human ruins for the warriors. The knowledge with which he did so isnow long lost.  It was from their enemies that he learned the language and thought patternsrequired to do this. For him, wielding these skills against them was perhaps adeeply satisfying act of revenge.  Yet his unconcealed hatred for them was a recurring cause of great concernamong his fellow heroes.
